stories.title: User Login with Biometrics
stories.description: As a mobile banking user, I want to log in using fingerprint or face recognition so that I can securely access my account without typing a password.
acceptance_criteria: User can authenticate via fingerprint on supported devices
User can authenticate via Face ID on supported devices
Fallback to PIN entry if biometric fails 3 times
Session token is securely stored in device keychain

tasks.title: Write unit tests for auth flow
QA testing on iOS and Android

stories.title: Account Balance Dashboard
stories.description: As a user, I want to see all my account balances on a single dashboard so that I can quickly check my financial position.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard shows checking, savings, and credit card balances
Balances refresh on pull-to-refresh gesture
Last updated timestamp is displayed
Currency formatting follows user locale

stories.title: Fund Transfer Between Own Accounts
stories.description: As a user, I want to transfer money between my own accounts so that I can manage my funds conveniently.
acceptance_criteria: User can select source and destination accounts
Transfer amount is validated against available balance
Confirmation screen shows transfer details before execution
Transfer receipt is generated and stored in history
Real-time balance update after transfer

stories.title: Push Notification for Transactions
stories.description: As a user, I want to receive push notifications for every transaction so that I am immediately aware of account activity.
acceptance_criteria: Push notification sent within 5 seconds of transaction
Notification includes transaction type, amount, and balance
User can configure notification preferences
Notifications work on both iOS and Android

stories.title: Transaction History with Search
stories.description: As a user, I want to view my transaction history with search and filter capabilities so that I can find specific transactions easily.
acceptance_criteria: Transaction list shows last 90 days by default
User can search by merchant name or amount
Filter by date range, transaction type, and amount range
Pagination with infinite scroll
Transaction detail view on tap

tasks.title: Build transaction list API with pagination
Create transaction list UI with infinite scroll

stories.title: Bill Payment Integration
stories.description: As a user, I want to pay my utility bills directly from the app so that I can manage all my payments in one place.
acceptance_criteria: Integration with at least 5 major utility providers
User can save billers for quick access
Payment schedule and confirmation flow
Payment receipt stored in transaction history

tasks.title: Build biller selection and payment UI

stories.title: Spending Analytics Dashboard
stories.description: As a user, I want to see a breakdown of my spending by category so that I can understand my financial habits.
acceptance_criteria: Pie chart showing spending categories
Monthly comparison bar chart
Category drill-down with transaction list
Customizable time period selector

stories.title: QR Code Payment
stories.description: As a user, I want to make payments by scanning a QR code so that I can pay merchants quickly at point of sale.
acceptance_criteria: Camera-based QR scanner integrated in app
Support for UPI and merchant-specific QR formats
Amount pre-filled from QR data where available
Payment confirmation with merchant details

tasks.title: QA testing with sample QR codes

stories.title: Profile Management
stories.description: As a user, I want to view and edit my profile information so that my banking details are always up to date.
acceptance_criteria: Display current profile information
Edit phone number with OTP verification
Edit email with confirmation link
Upload and crop profile photo
Address update with document verification flow

tasks.title: Add OTP and email verification flows

stories.title: Card Management (Freeze/Unfreeze)
stories.description: As a user, I want to freeze and unfreeze my debit/credit cards from the app so that I can quickly respond to suspected fraud.
acceptance_criteria: Toggle switch to freeze/unfreeze each card
Immediate effect on card transactions
Push notification confirming status change
Card detail view showing current status and last 4 digits

tasks.title: Create card list and detail UI
Trigger push notification on status change

stories.title: Recurring Payment Setup
stories.description: As a user, I want to set up recurring payments for regular bills so that I never miss a payment deadline.
acceptance_criteria: User can schedule weekly, monthly, or custom recurrence
Edit or cancel upcoming scheduled payments
Notification 2 days before scheduled payment
Payment failure retry logic with user notification

tasks.title: Build scheduling engine with cron-like rules

stories.title: Multi-Currency Support
stories.description: As a user who travels internationally, I want to view balances and transact in multiple currencies so that I can manage foreign transactions.
acceptance_criteria: Display balances in user-selected currency
Real-time exchange rate display
Currency conversion calculator
Transaction history shows original and converted amounts

stories.title: In-App Customer Support Chat
stories.description: As a user, I want to chat with customer support directly in the app so that I can resolve issues without calling the helpline.
acceptance_criteria: Real-time chat with support agents
Chat history persists across sessions
File and screenshot attachment support
Typing indicator and read receipts
Fallback to FAQ/help articles when agents unavailable

tasks.title: Build chat UI with message bubbles
Add typing indicators and read receipts

stories.title: Savings Goal Tracker
stories.description: As a user, I want to create savings goals and track my progress so that I can stay motivated toward financial targets.
acceptance_criteria: Create named savings goals with target amount and deadline
Visual progress bar and percentage tracker
Auto-deduct feature from checking to savings goal
Milestone notifications at 25%, 50%, 75%, and 100%

tasks.title: Build savings goal data model and API
Create goal tracking UI with progress visualization

stories.title: Two-Factor Authentication Setup
stories.description: As a security-conscious user, I want to enable two-factor authentication so that my account has an additional layer of protection.
acceptance_criteria: Support for SMS-based OTP
Support for authenticator app (TOTP)
Backup recovery codes generated on setup
2FA required for high-value transactions

tasks.title: Generate and store backup recovery codes
Add 2FA challenge to high-value transaction flow

stories.title: Statement Download (PDF)
stories.description: As a user, I want to download my account statements as PDF files so that I can keep records for tax filing and personal accounting.
acceptance_criteria: Generate statement for selected date range
PDF includes bank logo, account details, and transactions
Download or share via device share sheet
Statements available for last 24 months

stories.title: Dark Mode Theme
stories.description: As a user, I want to switch to dark mode so that the app is comfortable to use in low-light environments.
acceptance_criteria: Toggle between light and dark themes in settings
Follow system-level theme preference by default
All screens and components support both themes
Smooth transition animation between themes

tasks.title: Define dark mode color palette and tokens
Update all UI components for theme support
Implement theme toggle and system preference detection
QA visual regression testing across screens

stories.title: Beneficiary Management
stories.description: As a user, I want to add, edit, and delete beneficiaries so that I can quickly transfer money to frequent recipients.
acceptance_criteria: Add beneficiary with name, account number, and bank
Edit existing beneficiary details
Delete with confirmation prompt
Search and filter beneficiary list
Verification step when adding new beneficiaries

tasks.title: Create beneficiary list and form UI

stories.title: App Onboarding Tour
stories.description: As a new user, I want a guided onboarding tour so that I can quickly learn how to use the key features of the app.
acceptance_criteria: Step-by-step overlay highlighting key features
Skip option available at any point
Tour automatically shown on first login only
User can replay tour from settings

tasks.title: Implement first-login detection and tour trigger

stories.title: Accessibility Compliance (WCAG 2.1)
stories.description: As a user with disabilities, I want the app to meet WCAG 2.1 AA standards so that I can use all features with assistive technologies.
acceptance_criteria: All interactive elements have accessible labels
Screen reader navigation works on all screens
Color contrast meets AA ratio requirements
Touch targets are at least 44x44 points
Focus order follows logical reading sequence

tasks.title: Audit all screens for accessibility issues
Ensure correct focus order and touch targets
